messages.content: Thank you for calling Google support. My name is Curie. May I know your name, please?
It's Oliver. Can you help me with my Android device or not?
Of course, Oliver. I ackslash'm here to help. Could you please describe the issue you ackslash're facing with your Android device?
I ackslash've been having constant issues with the latest update. My phone crashes all the time, and I ackslash'm beyond frustrated!

I ackslash'm really sorry to hear that, Oliver. I understand how frustrating that must be. Let ackslash's see what we can do to resolve this. Have you tried restarting your device in safe mode to see if the crashes still occur?
Yes, I have! It still crashes. I need this fixed now!

I apologize for the inconvenience, Oliver. Let ackslash's try another approach. Can you please check if there are any pending updates for your apps or the system itself? Sometimes subsequent updates can fix such issues.
I ackslash've already updated everything! Can ackslash't you guys fix your software before releasing it?

I ackslash'm truly sorry for the trouble you ackslash've faced. To expedite this, I ackslash'll escalate your case to our technical team. They might require some additional information or logs from your device to diagnose the problem accurately. Is that okay with you?
Fine, just get it done quickly. I can ackslash't keep dealing with this.
Absolutely, Oliver. We ackslash'll make this a priority and get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you for your patience.
